summary: This module contains a suite of tests and helper utilities that validate the behavior of DGL's distributed data loaders under multiprocessing. It exercises neighbor sampling, node/edge/negative sampling, and multiple concurrent loaders on partitioned graphs, ensuring correct data partitioning, sampling logic, and inter-process coordination.
